Articles.Content: So I have been trying to understand how these guys do it. I view pictures in the spaceplane exchange, I watch videos of some vehicles (Take offs, can\'t find constructions >![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) ) How do you guys build these huge wings!!! ???

Use the wing board and the delta and normal wings to build other wings. For somplex wing structures, many of each part is often necessary, and you\'ll have to rotate them with WASDQE to fit the style of wing you want.

If all else fails, download others crafts from the Exchange and see how they did it.
